metadata.title: CVE-2019-17624 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: "" In X.Org X Server 1.20.4, there is a stack-based buffer overflow in thefunction XQueryKeymap. For example, by sending ct.c_char 1000 times, anattacker can cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact. Note: It is disputed if the X.Org X Server isinvolved or if there is a stack overflow.

criterions.comment: xorg-server-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
